name: PurchasingNet
overview: PurchasingNet, Inc. provides Web-based eProcurement and ePayables software to mid-and large-sized companies. The companyâ€™s eProcurement solution streamlines requisitioning, approvals, purchasing management, receiving, inventory control, catalog management, and eSourcing. It offers ePayables solution that includes the supplier invoice portal, electronic invoice processing, invoice processing, invoice matching, early payment discount management, and eStatements; and enterprise spend management provides up-to-the-minute spend analysis in a configurable dashboard and fixed assets module. The company also provides client support, catalog management, process mapping, on-site installation/training, software customization, integration with legacy systems, and project management services. It serves customers primarily in financial service, retail/consumer product, professional service, retail, manufacturing, healthcare, and media/publishing industries. The company was founded as American Tech, Inc. in 1984 and changed its name to PurchasingNet, Inc. in 2000. PurchasingNet is based in Red Bank, New Jersey
